message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $1,300,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value this product offers.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
